Articles.Content:
The CapacitX fuel tank looks like the FL-T500, but has a capacity close to 1,000,000 (a million) times more! I\'m also developing a Lite version, half the size of the regulat one!

Download Link

[http://playeti.com/mods/details/40](http://playeti.com/mods/details/40)

OR...

See attachment!
Does it at least have a much heavier weight to make it somewhat balanced? Or is it just a cheat partt with a reskin
I think every people can make their own fuel levels into them!

> 
> just a cheat partt with a reskin

You\'re not 'developing' anything. Changing a .png and editing a .cfg file to insane values doesn\'t count as 'development'. Anyone can do it.

You should keep this sort of stuff for your own personal use, unless it\'s useful for the community.
Uhh, I have NO CLUE how to.
one engine to rule them all

> 
> Uhh, I have NO CLUE how to.

Open parts folder, look for file called part.cfg, open in wordpad, have fun.

> 
> Open parts folder, look for file called part.cfg, open in wordpad, have fun.

>2012

>not using NP++

>ISHYDDT
useful for put on orbit a space station with one thank only:)
